titleStmt.title: Variants of Raising of a in stressed closed syllable before a - maCCaC
titleStmt.author: Veronika Engler

sourceDesc.p: This is the feature-file for Raising of a in stressed closed syllable before a - maCCaC

item.label: a > a and i become schwa for the Maghreb

wib:featureValueObservation.note: Elderly (70+), Old (60-70) and some middle age speakers show consistent raising of short medial a in stressed closed syllable.
Young speakers and some middle-aged speakers do not show raising of short medial a in stressed closed syllable, unlike Elderly (70+), Old (60-70) and some middle age speakers who do show it.

cit.quote: traditional dish made with rice, yogurt and meat or chicken
traditional dish made with rice, yogurt and meat or chicken

wib:featureValueObservation.note: The word mitjar is now vesitigial, the favoured standard word for 'airport' is ajruport
